00212 inline Statistics Statistics::operator+ (const Statistics& statistics) const
00213 {
00214     Statistics temp;
00215 
00216     temp.backgroundReferenceGrayLevelFindingTime_   = this->backgroundReferenceGrayLevelFindingTime_    + statistics.backgroundReferenceGrayLevelFindingTime_;

00223

00285 inline void Statistics::backgroundReferenceGrayLevelFindingTime (const float& time)
00286 {
00287     backgroundReferenceGrayLevelFindingTime_ = time;
00288     
00289     preprocessingTime_ = backgroundReferenceGrayLevelFindingTime_ + optimalThresholdComputingTime_ + noiseRemovalTime_;
